attributes.action: Speed Ramps/Enforcement on Victoria Road, Tipton
attributes.additional_details:
Residents witness incidents with speeding vehicles EVERY DAY, and most of their front walls have been replaced due to RTC's.
I do not want my child risking their life just by walking out the front door.
Local Council have replied with "there is limited funding" & "The RTC count is not high enough, even though most of these are not reported".
They have acknowledged that there is issues with the road but as the STATS do not add up nothing can be done.
attributes.background:
Victoria Rd, Tipton has had a massive amount of RTC's for the past 30 years, recently this is increasing and it's only a matter of time before there is a fatality.
It surrounds a park where children and families visit regularly and seem to risk their life just to cross the road to access the park.

rejection.details:
You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:
